18#include "DMReader.h"
19#include "DMDecoder.h"
20#include "DMDetector.h"
21#include "Result.h"
22#include "BitMatrix.h"
23#include "BinaryBitmap.h"
24#include "DecodeHints.h"
25#include "DecoderResult.h"
26#include "DetectorResult.h"
27
28#include <utility>
29#include <vector>
30
31namespace ZXing {
32namespace DataMatrix {
33
34Reader::Reader(const DecodeHints& hints)
35 : _tryRotate(hints.tryRotate()), _tryHarder(hints.tryHarder()), _isPure(hints.isPure())
36{
37}
38
39/**
40* Locates and decodes a Data Matrix code in an image.
41*
42* @return a string representing the content encoded by the Data Matrix code
43* @throws NotFoundException if a Data Matrix code cannot be found
44* @throws FormatException if a Data Matrix code cannot be decoded
45* @throws ChecksumException if error correction fails
46*/
47Result
48Reader::decode(const BinaryBitmap& image) const
49{
50 auto binImg = image.getBlackMatrix();
51 if (binImg == nullptr) {
52 return Result(DecodeStatus::NotFound);
53 }
54
55 auto detectorResult = Detector::Detect(*binImg, _tryHarder, _tryRotate, _isPure);
56 if (!detectorResult.isValid())
57 return Result(DecodeStatus::NotFound);
58
59 return Result(Decoder::Decode(detectorResult.bits()), std::move(detectorResult).position(),
60 BarcodeFormat::DATA_MATRIX);
61}
62
63} // DataMatrix
64} // ZXing
65
